metadata.Title: CVE-2021-41262 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Galette is a membership management web application built for non profitorganizations and released under GPLv3. Versions prior to 0.9.6 are subjectto SQL injection attacks by users with "member" privilege. Users areadvised to upgrade to version 0.9.6 as soon as possible. There are no knownworkarounds.

criterions.comment: galette: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
